name: The Tranquility
description:
This game was created to run on an original Gameboy. I have included the ROM file if you would like to test it out the way it was meant to be played.

You are a astronaut on a sentient space ship trying to keep it alive as various problems occur. Find the right item and bring it to the right person to keep the ship running. You can only hold one item at a time.

I am not good at music or audio, usually have a friend help me, and its even harder to make sound for a Gameboy, so just hum your favorite tune while you play ;)

Controls:

Game controls:

A - Pickup/Interact/Advance Text

DPAD to move

Gameboy Emulator Mappings:

Z - A

X - B

Shift - Select

Enter - Start

WASD/Arrow Keys - DPAD
